actions.description: The swarm makes two Gnashing Teeth attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) piercing damage, or 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
actions.name: Gnashing Teeth

conditionImmunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
name: Swarm of Gibberlings [QftIS]

specialTraits.description: If the swarm takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.
specialTraits.name: Aversion to Fire

specialTraits.description: Any non-gibberling that is within 60 feet of the swarm and doesn't have the deafened condition has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells and similar effects.
specialTraits.name: Incessant Gibberish

specialTraits.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough to accommodate a Small gibberling. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
specialTraits.name: Swarm
